resources.string: App not started from the Google Maps share menu. See help for details.
Could not download address. Check your internet connection and try again
The shared link was not a valid Google Maps link
There was no valid URL in the shared link
The Google Maps Send To Car feature is not available in this country
The address you selected cannot be used with Send To Car. Try an address in a different country
Could not send the destination. Try again later
Invalid account. Check that you entered it correctly and try again
Invalid Destination Tag. Rename it and try again

There is currently a limit of 5 destinations that can be saved to OnStar. When you reach the limit, you cannot send a new destination (i.e. it doesn\'t overwrite one of the existing points). Please visit https://www.onstar.com/web/portal/odm and remove some destinations.\n\nThis is a bug on GM\'s system and outside the control of this app. If you are upset with this behavior, feel free to let your OnStar Advisor know.
A Destination Tag with this name already exists. Rename it and try again
This destination cannot be sent to your car. Try a different destination
Start Google Maps and click on a place
The address is approximate\nVerify before driving
